column4: **something really simple people....:i want to recover my root password _but_ before that i want to save the system log files (if any) to check if someone logged in before me... i am sure this is possible but how? any link i should consider
there is no root password by default
Exteris : ok,agreed(my sudo password...) im on livecd now and i want to make a copy of my system log... how? not really an expierinced user...
you know how to reset your password?  Why don't you just reset your password and then copy the log files?
